section.title: Apache Forrest - org.apache.forrest.plugin.internal.NoteTaking Plugin
section.p: Provides features that facilitate the creation of a study aid package with Forrest.
section.warning: This plugin will only work with a Views enabled site.
section.note: This plugin will only work when Forrest is running in dynamic mode.

section.title: Adding a Notes Section
section.p: A notes section is provided by a contract called content-noteTaking. See the contract documentation for an example of how to include this contract in your pages.

section.title: Configuration
section.p: As can be seen above, the physical representation of the notes field is controlled by the contract definition in your structurer file. In addition, There are various non-visual aspects of this plugin can be configured by the site designer. The table below lists the properties that may be configured and their defaults. To change a property add it to your forrest.properties.xml file.

tr.td: The URL of the repository for notes. It should end with a '/'.
The name of the file that will contain notes.

section.warning: Defaults are not currently implemented. They are waiting on this issue. However, the forrest.properties.xml file is present in the plugin directory and will should start working once the above issue is resolved. In the meantime, projects should define the above properties.
